void Mezzo::SeqMemBlockContext::Deref (   )  [virtual]
 

Implements Mezzo::SeqBlockContext.

int Mezzo::SeqMemBlockContext::GetNumSeqBlocks (   )  [virtual]
 

Get the number of SeqBlocks currently allocated in this context. If the owner of this context thinks that all blocks have been freed but finds that this method returns nonzero, the client knows it leaked some blocks.

Implements Mezzo::SeqBlockContext.

SeqBlock * Mezzo::SeqMemBlockContext::GetSeqBlockRef (  SeqBlock *  block  )  [virtual]
 

Get a reference that is suitable for use in this context, whether the given SeqBlock is from this context or not. In practice this will add one to the refcount and return the same block if the given block is from this context, otherwise it will make a copy in this context.

Implements Mezzo::SeqBlockContext.

SeqBlock * Mezzo::SeqMemBlockContext::NewSeqBlock (  Buffer  buffer  )  [virtual]
 

Implements Mezzo::SeqBlockContext.

void Mezzo::SeqMemBlockContext::Ref (   )  [virtual]
 

Implements Mezzo::SeqBlockContext.

void Mezzo::SeqMemBlockContext::ReleaseSeqBlockRef (  SeqBlock *  block  )  [virtual]
 

Free use of a block previously acquired using either NewSeqBlock or GetRef. In practice this will decrement the reference count by one, and delete the block if the reference count hits zero.

Implements Mezzo::SeqBlockContext.
